visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include two series named 'Series 1' and 'Series 2' with the provided data. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and a legend with vertical layout and item margins.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray (#f9f9f9). The chart has custom margins for better spacing. The x-axis categories represent months, and the y-axis title indicates temperature in degrees Celsius. Both axes have styled labels with a specific color and font size. The legend is vertically laid out with custom item margins. The data series include two sets of monthly temperature data, named 'Series 1' and 'Series 2', each with a distinct color. Additional configurations ensure a clean and readable chart layout.
